name: Super Smash Cadens Clicker
description: Super Smash Cadens is our version of Super Smash Brothers and this is a goofy clicker game based on it. Click, or I guess tap, on the Super Smash Cadens logo to get more clicks. There are various upgrades to get as well, which are more clicks per click, autoclicker, autoclicker autoclicker (just joking), and getting bonus clicks based on a percentage. Try to get as many clicks as possible!
